message.content:
The task is to identify the line item specifically related to the costs of general management and administration of the entity as a whole from the income statement provided.

Looking at the problem data:

| Account                | Amount     | Date       |
|------------------------|------------|------------|
| Main Business Revenue   | 7825951.24 | 2024-01-30 |
| Total Revenue          | 7825951.24 | 2024-01-30 |
| Cost of Goods Sold      | 6290000.00 | 2024-01-30 |
| Total Cost             | 6290000.00 | 2024-01-30 |
| Gross Profit           | 1535951.24 | 2024-01-30 |
| Administrative Expenses| 1335153.59 | 2024-01-30 |
| Selling Expenses       | 627729.56  | 2024-01-30 |
| Depreciation           | 45753.36   | 2024-01-30 |
| Financial Expenses     | 543212.45  | 2024-01-30 |
| Total Expenses         | 2551848.96 | 2024-01-30 |
| Interest Income        | 5758.38    | 2024-01-30 |
| Profit Before Tax      | -1010139.34| 2024-01-30 |
| Tax Expense            | 391297.55  | 2024-01-30 |
| Net Profit             | -1401436.89| 2024-01-30 |

The line item that corresponds to the costs of general management and administration is very commonly labeled "Administrative Expenses" (which includes general management and admin costs).

Hence the value for costs of general management and administration is: 1335153.59

```json
{"solution": {"value": "1335153.59"} }
```
